author: rhuijben
msg: (handle_checkout): Handle invalid network input a bit better.

author: gstein
msg: Adjust the dir-construction process to simplify it, and to remember the
(svn_wc__db_init): take a DB parameter, which we can plug the new
(svn_wc__db_init): take a DB param. add some assertions. construct the
new SDB in the DB's state_pool. construct a PDH and a WCROOT for the
new directory, and store those into the DB. ensure all this stuff is
allocated in the state pool. and don't close the SDB on exit.
(init_adm): take a DB and rename the PATH param to LOCAL_ABSPATH. also
rename REPOS to REPOS_ROOT_URL. track the renames into the func.
rather than calling entries_init(), just call directly to DB_INIT

author: rhuijben
msg: Extract the loggy property update from the property merge code, to
prepare performing the property update as wq property install operation
instead of a loggy file operation.
(svn_wc_merge_props3): Update caller. Update properties via loggy.
(svn_wc__merge_props): Return new property hashes to caller instead
of just adding them to the log accumulator. Introduce scratch pool.
(close_directory): Update caller. Update properties via the log
merge_file): Update caller. Hand property hashes to caller.
(close_file): Update caller. Update properties in its own
wq operation before the file accumulator to make sure
properties are set correctly before the file is translated.

author: gstein
msg: Clean out some unused adm-area handling functions. Rename some params in
the old entries handling code to clarify their contents/purpose.
(open_adm_file): remove obsolete docstring. pass SUBDIR and FNAME as
parameters, rather than varargs. remove FOR_WRITING, and consider it
always TRUE, simplifying several if-blocks in the function.
(svn_wc__open_adm_stream): rename param to DIR_ABSPATH. construct the
path using svn_wc__adm_child, then open/return its stream.
